questions.question: Complete calculations using your IPT Pipe Trades Handbook and the measurements in Figure 47. Calculate the Throw when Imperial = 90
questions.explanation: Method 1) = NPS x 5/8 = 8" x 5/8 = 5". Method 2) NPS x 1/2 x 1/2 = 4". Add the 1st and 3rd answers. 8" x 1/2 = 4" x 1/2 = 2" x 1/2 = 1". Add 1st and 3rd, 4" + 1" = 5".
